dict.acceptation: 两个；两个东西；两点钟；一对；

sent.orig: "One box" is singular; "two boxes" is plural.
Besides the two novels, I have bought two atlases.
sent.trans: 我买了两本小说，另外还买了两本地图册。

sent.orig: He's inclined to put two and two together and make five (= make an incorrect guess from what he sees, hears, etc.).
sent.trans: 他爱捕风捉影，听风就是雨。

sent.orig: If you put two and two together, there can be only one conclusion.
sent.trans: 根据事实推断，只可能有一个结论。

sent.orig: It is certain that two and two makes four.
sent.trans: 二加二等于四是确定无疑的。
